rules_text:
[i](As an Arena enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it's defeated, exile it, then cast it converted for free.)[/i]
When this battle enters, it deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
rules_text2: At the beginning of each players end step, if that player didn't attack this turn, that player loses 3 life.
flavor_text2: [i]Rules aren't made to be broken, they're made to be enforced. Those who don't follow the rules will be dealt with.[/i]
notes: When this battle enters, up to one target creature you control gains lifelink until end of turn. It deals 3 damage to target player, planeswalker or battle.
